page.title: 09FARMING - ARABLE
page.content: The Payne family farm approx: 1250 acres. It is mainly arable farming and they grow 200 acr.sugar-beet, 120 acr. potatoes, 250 acr.winter wheat,40 acr. fodder peas,60 acr.lupins,100 acr.rape 15 acr.sprouts, 80 acr.winter barley and 130 acr.spring barley. A typical day might be:- {5.30am}Get up, check crops and stock {7am}Give instructions for days work {7.30am}Breakfast {8am}Check workmen's progress {9am}Coffee,check post & correspondence {9.30am-1pm}Do work as necessary but ensure farm is running efficiently {1-1.30pm}Lunch and weather forecast {1.30-5pm}Work at whatever is necessary {5pm}Tea In winter no outside work is possible after this so do any book- keeping,corres.etc.In summer work goes on with the final check on crops and stock at {8-9pm.
